column4: I want to start checking out Empathy with git instead of using Ubuntu's repos. Just to double check, I shouold uninstall from Ubuntu's repos and then install from git for a proper installation, correct?
uhmm there is probably a ppa for Empathy on luanchpad  for a later one for 9.10
Probably true. Is it only for Empathy?
there are ppa's for loads of apps
you shoudn't install to many ppa's though,  since problems might happen if you do
rather useless factoid I guess, but anyway
I guess that's what I'm getting at. Since git will only draw exactly what it needs to draw, it would reduce that problem
oh it seems to have been updated :)
PPA's can lead to conflicting versions of software
I'm just trying to keep it simple, really
quite true there. I have an ati card
probably will never get both compiz and its drivers working :(
well Compiz is pretty sucky anyway
just having to use the default drivers for now
it just means I can't do games and what not
